import React from 'react'; import './donation.css'; const Donation = ({ pictureUrl, title, username, amount, target, description, handleDonate, handleShare, handleReport }) => { const amountPercentage = (amount * 100) / target; return (

{title}

{username}
${amount} The target is to raise ${target}

Description

{description}

); } export default Donation;
